title: Worlds Apart
lyrics:
We are the ones, we are the ones here for the love
We are the ones, we are the ones here for the love

I wanna get you close
But I feel we’re worlds apart
Don't wanna let you go
But I feel we're worlds apart
I wanna get you close
But I feel we’re worlds apart
Don't wanna let you go
But I feel we're worlds apart
I feel we're worlds apart

I wanna get you close
But I feel we're worlds apart
Don't wanna let you go
But I feel we're worlds apart
I feel we're worlds apart

The touch of your hand
I’m captivated by the way your body move
Say you understand
There ain’t no place I wouldn't go to get to you

We are the ones, we are the ones here for the love
We are the ones, we are the ones here for the love

I wanna get you close
But I feel we’re worlds apart
Don't wanna let you go
But I feel we're worlds apart
I wanna get you close
But I feel we're worlds apart
Don’t wanna let you go
But I feel we're worlds apart
I feel we're worlds apart

But I feel we're worlds apart
Don't wanna let you go
But I feel we're worlds apart
I feel we're worlds apart
